TemplateContents.Body:
Dear ##Employee##,

We are writing to inform you of the status of your recent request submitted to your manager.


We are happy to inform you that your request has been approved by your manager.

Find details below:

  • Request Type: ##RequestType##
  • Date of Request: ##RequestDate##
  • Approval Date: ##Approval Date##


If you have any further questions or need additional details, please feel free to reach out.


Regards,

##Manager##
